2 #define SCALARS_H

4 #include <boost/mpl/vector.hpp>
5 #include <boost/mpl/size.hpp>
6 #include <array>
7 #include <util/ssize_t.h>
8 
9 namespace vistle {
10 
11 // list of data types usable in Vistle's shm arrays
12 typedef boost::mpl::vector<unsigned char, int32_t, uint32_t, int64_t, uint64_t, float, double> Scalars;
13 const std::array<const char*, boost::mpl::size<Scalars>::value> ScalarTypeNames = {{"unsigned char", "int32_t", "uint32_t", "int64_t", "uint64_t", "float", "double"}};

15 }
